Pubbāpeti，[denom．fr．pubba2] occurs only in one phrase （gattāni pubbāpayamāno） at M．I，161 & A．III，345≈402 in meaning “drying again”； at both A pass．the vv．ll．（glosses） are “sukkhāpayamāno” and “pubba-sadisāni kurumāno”； to the M．pass．cp．Trenckner’s notes on p．543，with the BB expln of the word （=pubbabhāvaṁ gamayamāno），also Neumann，Majjh．trsln I．260．The similar passage at S．I，8，10 has “gattāni sukkhāpayamāno” as T．reading and “pubbāpayamāno” as v．l．BB．（Page 468）
